top-page.title:
Take the work out 
of making a maintenance request
top-page.desc: Stay updated about the status of your work orders and get access to your history of resolved maintenance requests to make sure you get your deposit back.

images.title: Transparents communication solves issues faster
images.desc: No more telephone tag. Get notified about the status of your maintenance request so you can follow the progress and talk to your landlord about any issues.

title-one.title: What makes Rentorr maintenance requests different?

text-start.title: Photos and videos
text-start.text: Attach photos and videos to your maintenance requests to make it easier for your landlord to identify the issue and get it fixed the first time.

text-center.title: Documents
text-center.text: Get access to an archived history of maintenance requests and repairs for your own record.

text-end.title: Notification
text-end.text: Stay informed about the progress of your maintenance request and get notified when it’s finished.

ready.title: Ready to start using Rentorr
ready.desc: It shouldn’t feel like a second job to live in a rental property. Rentorr was made to simplify the process and help you and your landlord have a better renting experience.
